name: True-Israel
startIntroPart1: Through Christ, you are appointed to lead us into dominion over the Earth, which the Lord our God has promised us dominion over. He, God, will be with you. Glory be to God! (Side note: The player is not God)
declaringWar: May you repent before God's wrath comes upon you.
attacked: Has the Lord forsaken His people? Nevertheless, I will return to Him and praise Him in the midst of my enemies.
defeated: May you praise the LORD, for He has used you to judge His people.
The Lord has witnessed this, and will hold you accountable.
introduction: Greetings. May the peace and mercy from Yah fill you.
Know this first: We serve the Most High God.
neutralHello: May God's peace be on your people.
neutralNo: No, thank you. May God bless you.
hateHello: May God bless you with the mercy of repentance.
By God's mercy and grace, you stand before me today.
hateLetsHearIt: 'He seems to be silently waiting for you to speak'
hateNo: Is this a snare from the devil himself?
With what mind have you thought up this thing?
hateYes: It is only by God's grace that I accept this.
afterPeace: Thank you. Now, make peace with the Lord, or else.
Bless the LORD, for He has been merciful upon His people. And no, you are not the LORD.
tradeRequest: The Lord lead me to this offer.
Let us reason with each other.
Greetings! May the Lord's peace be upon you. Consider this request.
